001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
007import com.commercetools.api.models.payment.Payment;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.payment.PaymentDraft;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.payment.PaymentDraftBuilder;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.payment.PaymentUpdate;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.payment.PaymentUpdateAction;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.payment.PaymentUpdateActionBuilder;
013
014public interface ByProjectKeyPaymentsRequestBuilderMixin {
015    public ByProjectKeyPaymentsPost post(PaymentDraft paymentDraft);
016
017    public ByProjectKeyPaymentsByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
018
019    public default ByProjectKeyPaymentsByIDPost update(Versioned<Payment> payment,
020            java.util.List<PaymentUpdateAction> actions) {
021        return withId(payment.getId())
022                .post(builder -> PaymentUpdate.builder().version(payment.getVersion()).actions(actions));
023    }
024
025    public default ByProjectKeyPaymentsByIDPost update(Versioned<Payment> payment,
026            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<PaymentUpdateAction, PaymentUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
027        return withId(payment.getId()).post(builder -> PaymentUpdate.builder()
028                .version(payment.getVersion())
029                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(PaymentUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
030    }
031
032    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<PaymentUpdateAction, PaymentUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyPaymentsByIDPost> update(
033            Versioned<Payment> payment) {
034        return builder -> withId(payment.getId()).post(b -> PaymentUpdate.builder()
035                .version(payment.getVersion())
036                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(PaymentUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
037    }
038
039    public default ByProjectKeyPaymentsByIDDelete delete(Versioned<Payment> payment) {
040        return withId(payment.getId()).delete().withVersion(payment.getVersion());
041    }
042
043    public default ByProjectKeyPaymentsPost create(PaymentDraft paymentDraft) {
044        return post(paymentDraft);
045    }
046
047    public default ByProjectKeyPaymentsPost create(UnaryOperator<PaymentDraftBuilder> op) {
048        return post(op.apply(PaymentDraftBuilder.of()).build());
049    }
050}
